alert.note: Alert for Kent; Providence; Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 7:41AM EST until further notice by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Much of the northern half of Rhode Island. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 738 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain over the last several hours, with 1 to 2 inches have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Providence, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, East Providence, Woonsocket, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, North Kingstown, Attleboro, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Burrillville, East Greenwich and North Smithfield. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
